title: Welt Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fair trade cafe serves a mostly vegetarian menu, with some vegan choices or dishes that can be made vegan. Specializes in breakfast (served until 10pm) and brunch (served only on weekends). Serves a large variety of beverages, including alcohol. Trendy atmosphere. Free Wi-Fi.
